name: gadgetguru

”Alexa, open gadget guru”
skdetail:

Invocation Name: gadget guru
des:
gadget guru is a fact app that lets you know all the latest tech news there is to know in this gadget-o-verse.

Geek in with echo and learn facts about gadgets in the nerdy way possible!
priv: The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
